# Trump 2025 Day 1 E.O.s

## ["Energy emergency" E.O.](https://www.whitehouse.gov/presidential-actions/2025/01/declaring-a-national-energy-emergency/)

To promote fossil fuels, nuclear, and mining, government agencies should:

Sec. 2. Use eminent domain & Defense Production Act to commandeer private property

Sec. 3-6. Exempt fossil fuels from normal health/safety/environmental/cost review

- "Emergency approvals" for leasing, siting, production, transportation, refining
- Waive Clean Water Act protections for water quality wetland, & coastline permits
- Approve exemptions from Endangered Species Act restrictions on actions that make species go extinct
  
Sec. 7. Mobilize the military to aid fossil fuel transport and refining and construct fossil fuel infrastructure


## [American Energy E.O.](https://www.whitehouse.gov/presidential-actions/2025/01/unleashing-american-energy/)  {.scrollable}

Sec. 2. 

- More federal funding for 
  - offshore oil and gas
  - mining 
- No federal funding for 
  - energy efficiency 
  - water efficiency
  - fuel efficiency 
  - electrification, esp. EVs
- No consideration of international effects in policymaking

Sec. 3-4. Deregulate oil, natural gas, coal, hydro, biofuels, mining, and nuclear industries

Sec. 5. Facilitate pipeline permitting and construction

- Expedite environmental review and permitting
- Reduce judicial review of NEPA compliance

Sec. 6. Change cost-benefit analysis 

  - exclude the social costs of GHGs 
  - exclude benefits of reducing GHGs
  - exclude international effects
  - increases discount rate (further down-weighting future costs and benefits)
  
  
Sec. 7. Pause the disbursement of funds appropriated through the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law and Inflation Reduction Act

- especially no money for electric vehicle charging stations

Sec. 8. Approve liquefied natural gas export terminals

- Skip NEPA review if possible

Sec. 9. Open public lands to mining

- more taxpayer support for locating minerals for private companies to min 
- more taxpayer support for mining projects
- increase National Defense Stockpile of minerals


## [Unleashing Alaska's Resouces E.O.](https://www.whitehouse.gov/presidential-actions/2025/01/unleashing-alaskas-extraordinary-resource-potential/) {background-opacity="0.2" background-image="https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-77DHTEAHfdE/TkXAzD8UDoI/AAAAAAAAASU/f3klXPyJjoo/s1600/alaska.jpg"}


Sec. 2-3. 

- Expedite permitting and leasing, especially for liquefied natural gas (LNG) export and pipelines
- Exempt LNG export from regulations 
-  Open Arctic National Wildlife Refuge to oil and gas extraction
- Replace 2024 BLM and NPS EIS with 2020 versions
- remove protections for subsistence resources
- deny the request for an indigenous sacred site in the Coastal Plain of the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge
- more hunting and fishing on federal lands
- support companies operating the failing  Trans-Alaska Pipeline
- more roads in National Forests
